strings.Value: "Are you serious? Just abandon everyone and leave?"
"That's a great idea! Let's just run — get as far from here as we can! — Right now!"
"What a silly idea! I can't abandon my {mf|barony|barony|kingdom|kingdom} and all my friends!"

{n}Octavia holds you tight. Her soft lips touch your ear, and she whispers softly.{/n} "Listen... Aren't you tired of all this? Expeditions, battles, constant blood and dirt... And worse yet — ambassadors, advisors and giving orders!"

"Let's just run away. Abandon all this. They aren't children — they'll figure it out without you! And we'll go... To {g|Absalom}Absalom{/g} — I've always wanted to see it! Or no, even farther! — Beyond the sea to {g|Osirion}Osirion{/g} or {g|Katapesh}Katapesh{/g}! Just you and I!"
"We'll take him with us! We'll all run!"
"Are you... Are you serious? Oh, {Name}, I love you so much!" {n}Octavia clings to you even tighter.{/n} "I was just joking, of course... What would they do without us? But you know what..."
"Maybe later, when all this is over... Maybe we really will run away. Think of it!" {n}The half-elf kisses your ear and pulls away.{/n}
"Well, yes, duty calls... A girl can dream! But you know what..."
"I'm not sure. I guess I probably am. We can't let everyone down, can we? But you know what..."
